headline: Putting Students in Charge of the Cafeteria
abstract: A new program lets students customize their meals, participate in taste tests and brainstorm ways to redesign their school cafeterias.
lead_paragraph: On a recent Tuesday, the cafeteria at KairosPDX charter school in Portland, Ore., was buzzing as students lined up to taste two freshly made butternut squash recipes. On one side of the table was roasted butternut squash. On the other side, a creamy butternut squash soup.
